name: YouAreUto
description:
YouAreUto is a mobile game that pushes you to think outside the box and use your lateral thinking in order to solve enigmas.

The game switches between the player in the real world (You Are You) and Uto (You Are Uto), the main actor in this alternative Japanese inspired world. So, what is real? Who is actually winning? You, Uto, both, none?

The current release is a MVP with 5 challenges; more is coming as YouAreUto goes open source! Get in touch if you are interested. And let your name be traveler, first rains of spring.
